title: All She Wants 4 Christmas
description: What if on Christmas Eve all your darkest desires came to life? Could you handle it?It's Christmas Eve, and all Monica Sims wants is for her fianc, just once, to step outside his comfort zone. She loves him, and life is fine in their perfectly planned world. But Monica is ready for more. She takes a risk and shares with him her darkest Domination. Submission. Surrendering to the will of more than one man. But her confession is more than her straitlaced boyfriend can handle-or so she thought.Dane knows exactly what he wants in just him and Monica, his fianc e-alone. Simple, easy, vanilla sex was all he ever needed. That was until the night he found his fianc e in her office, watching-enjoying-a very naughty movie on her laptop. Determined to be the one to unleash her control, Dane decides to surprise her on Christmas Eve with a trip to a private fetish club. But they won't be alone.
author: Jessica Lee
